name: python_docker_build
description: Build a Docker image for my Python application
content:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# Docker Build Script
# Generated by Echo for Marsh 🌙
# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

IMAGE_NAME="myapp"
TAG="v1.0.0"
DOCKERFILE="${DOCKERFILE:-Dockerfile}"
CONTEXT="${CONTEXT:-.}"

log() {
    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1"
}

log "Building Docker image: $IMAGE_NAME:$TAG"

# Build with BuildKit
DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build \
    -t "$IMAGE_NAME:$TAG" \
    -f "$DOCKERFILE" \
    --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 \
    "$CONTEXT"

# Tag as latest
docker tag "$IMAGE_NAME:$TAG" "$IMAGE_NAME:latest"

log "Build complete! 🌙"
docker images | grep "$IMAGE_NAME"
